item.dc:creator: khushiparikh03

item.title: RECIPEZOID
item.dc:creator: khushiparikh03
item.content:encoded:
ABOUT US

Every year typically has a few defining moments, but the past six months have contained many unexpected world-changing and paradigm-shifting developments. A lot of adjustments in a lot of habitual acts had to be made, where each one of us were forced to make the best of what was available, one of them being Food.

The RecipeZoid app focuses on generating the best and easiest recipes from already available ingredients at the user’s home. Along with bookmarking feature and a user friendly environment, this app is also a blessing for vegetarians and those who are novices in the world of cooking.

REASON THAT LED US TO THIS PROJECT

Food is fundamental to human existence. As the old saying goes, we are what we eat, and food related activities such as cooking, eating and talking about it take a significant portion of our daily life.

In these difficult times, where the entire human race got hit by a pandemic, an important lesson learnt apart from social distancing was “Happiness is homemade meals”. Hence, one of the main reasons of choosing this project was indulging in home-made food with easily available ingredients at one’s home.

Minimize the time for finding the right recipe

This application also deals with minimizing the time required to find the perfect recipe without the need to go grocery shopping.

For Amateur’s help

This application also comes in handy to those who are novice in the kitchen and need straight to – the – point recipes without any confusion.

SCOPE

RecipeZoid is an easy and personalized application, which is fit to use by all the age groups. However, it is most fit for the youth who live alone and struggle to cook. Through this application, they can not only find the right recipes, they also don’t have to go through the struggle of going shopping as RecipeZoid will show them the best recipes available, with whatever ingredients they already have. It is a also a beneficial application for women to widen their horizons of their kitchen with new and exciting dishes. It will also help save time.

TECHNOLOGIES USED

IDE : Android Studio

Android Studio provides the fastest tools for building apps on every type of Android device.

you can write better code, work faster, and be more productive with an intelligent code editor that provides code completion for Kotlin, Java, and C/C++ languages.

Front-end : Flutter

Flutter is Google’s UI toolkit for building beautiful, natively compiled applications for mobile, web, and desktop from a single codebase.

Flutter’s widgets incorporate all critical platform differences such as scrolling, navigation, icons and fonts

Back-end : Dart

Dart is a client-optimized language for fast apps on any platform

Dart helps painting your UI to life.

You can make changes iteratively by use hot reload to see the result instantly in your running app

Database : Firebase

Firebase is a comprehensive app development platform.

It has three core services: a real-time database, user authentication and hosting

The Firebase Realtime Database is a cloud-hosted NoSQL database that lets you store and sync data between your users in realtime.

FEATURES

  • Login/sign-up for personalized search results
  • List of ingredients in checkbox form
  • Bookmark the recipes you like
  • Search bar
  • Only selected ingredients will be featured in the recipes
  • Increased user friendliness
  • Pure Veg recipes

THE APP IN A GLANCE

GOAL

As established earlier, the sole purpose of the RecipeZoid application is for the users to come across new recipes from limited ingredients, available in handy, which it will rightfully serve.

FUTURE WORK

Although we have said, that the goal of this application will be accomplished, there are plenty of features that could be achieved :

  • Voice search feature can be adopted
  • A feature of “exclude” which can exclude certain ingredients for the user can be adopted.
  • A separate menu for “Kitchen tips and hacks” will enhance this app.
  • Nutrition wise sorting for people seeking healthy recipes will also be an elevating feature.

item.title: ReadReactReview
item.dc:creator: khushiparikh03
item.content:encoded:
ABOUT US

Validation is everything. It is in our human nature to seek validation in the smallest of things. When a person chooses to read a book, his/her precious time is going to be invested in it.

A book review is a guide for potential readers. ReadReactReview not only provide honest book reviews for the users but also other additional features like giving ratings, saving books for future reads etc.

REASON THAT LED US TO THIS PROJECT

Often when we choose to see a movie, we check its rating online. Only then we choose to invest our time in it. Then why not the same for books?

  • Amateurs can get a grip of the right book.
  • Bibliophiles can keep track of what to read next by the “my shelf” feature.
  • For getting unbiased reviews without urging or insisting people to buy the book(s).
  • Saving one’s time and energy by investing in the right book by reading its review.

SCOPE

ReadReactReview is a web application which can be used by all the people irrespective of their age. It is an application which will prove to be useful to avid as well as aspiring readers. Users will also be able to share their experience to other readers by penning down their own book reviews, while reading others’ as well.

TECHNOLOGIES USED

IDE : Visual Studio Code

Visual Studio Code includes built-in support for IntelliSense code completion, rich semantic code understanding and navigation, and code refactoring.

VS Code also integrates with build and scripting tools to perform common tasks making everyday workflows faster. VS Code has support for Git so you can work with source control without leaving the editor including viewing pending changes diffs.

Front-end : HTML, CSS, JS

HTML is the standard markup language for creating Web pages.HTML is easy to understand and use.HTML is supported by all the browsers

Out of all the programming languages that are available in the industry today, HTML is the most search engine friendly language. It is very easy to create a website using HTML. It causes minimal problems in terms of SEO and is very easy to work with when you try to make changes to your site to make it SEO compliant.

CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is a web design tool used to control the layout of a webpage while HTML deals with the actual content.

The layout of a web page is better controlled. With CSS web design, you can adjust the layout of a webpage. Without having to define the appearance for every single element, table, or block of text in the HTML file itself.

JavaScript is a text-based programming language used both on the client-side and server-side that allows you to make web pages interactive.

 Client-side JavaScript is very fast because it can be run immediately within the client-side browser. Gives the ability to create rich interfaces, JavaScript plays nicely with other languages and can be used in a huge variety of applications.

Back-end : PHP

  • PHP is a widely-used, open source scripting language
  • PHP scripts are executed on the server
  • PHP is free to download and use

Application can easily be loaded which are based on PHP and connected to database. it’s mainly used due to its faster rate of loading over slow internet and speed than another programing language.

Database : MySQL

MySQL is the world’s most popular open source database. With its proven performance, reliability and ease-of-use, MySQL has become the leading database choice for web-based applications, used by high profile web properties including Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, Yahoo! and many more.

Oracle drives MySQL innovation, delivering new capabilities to power next generation web, cloud, mobile and embedded applications.

FEATURES

  • Login/ sign-up
  • Search bar
  • Increased user friendliness.
  • Genre wise and author wise segregation of books and book reviews which the user can choose.
  • User can give star ratings and comments on books and book reviews as well.
  • User can share their own views by penning down book reviews and posting them.
  • Add books to the “My shelf” section to refer them later on (bookmark)
  • Pop-up window on book cover for its description.
  • Books segregation based on its level of difficulty.
  • Readers can also buy the book they want.

THE WEB APP IN A GLANCE

GOAL

The sole purpose of the ReadReactReview web app is for the users to come across new genre of books from wide range of availability and find books that interest them which it will rightfully serve.

GITHUB LINK

Click here to redirect to Github
